    rvm

    Aug 14, 2017

     rvm  rvm  ruby

    rvm usage

    1. remove rvm

    rvm implode or

    rm -rf ~/.rvm Don’t forget to remove the script calls in your .bashrc and/or .bash_profile (or whatever shell you’re using).

    1. upgrade

    rvm get head

    1. install with ruby
    MIRROR=1 curl -sSL https://git.io/vVHhJ bash
